name: Metricks for WooCommerce
author: Metricks

sections.description:
Metricks is a powerful tool allowing you to automate customer affiliate programs for your WooCommerce store.

  • Get more sales from word-of-mouth
  • Reward customers for referring their friends to your store
  • Easy install. 14 day risk-free trial. Get up and running today!

Boost your sales with a affiliate marketing program

Metricks helps you increase your sales by rewarding your customers when they refer people to your store. We give your customers a personal affiliate link that they can share with their friends.

Easily add a refer-a-friend program to your store

Simple to get up and running today — no developers needed!

short_description: The 'Metricks for WooCommerce' plugin automatically integrates Metricks with your WooCommerce store. Get more referred sales now!
